title: United States Government Budget
description: The United States recorded a government budget deficit of 88000 USD Million in October of 2022. Government Budget Value in the United States averaged -26720.87 USD Million from 1954 until 2022, reaching an all time high of 308215 USD Million in April of 2022 and a record low of -864074 USD Million in June of 2020. Federal Government budget balance is the difference between budget receipts (income) and budget outlays (spending).  A budget surplus is expressed as a positive value. A budget deficit is expressed as a negative value. This page provides - United States Government Budget Value - actual values, historical data, forecast, chart, statistics, economic calendar and news.
author: Financial Management Service, US Treasury
